entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
